Data Scientist and PhD student in Economic History, curious, and skilled in telling stories with data. Proven ability to lead projects transforming complex data into accessible, actionable insights for policy-relevant analysis. Eager to apply my expertise in structuring data to support economic research and policy development. I will be defending my PhD thesis in October 2025, with a focus on the application of AI in historical data extraction.
